SegmentReportMembers.Label: Segment report members
SegmentReportMembers.Tooltip: Activate this function if the employees in the segments for this attribute should be able to see the segment report which they are a member of.

AllowFilter.Label: Allow filter
AllowFilter.Tooltip: Allows users to filter on this attribute

DeleteConfirmationDialog.Title: Delete the attribute %{attributeName}?
DeleteConfirmationDialog.Content: This will permanently delete the attribute %{attributeName} and all the segments in it. This CANNOT be undone.
DeleteConfirmationDialog.ActionText: Please, type in DELETE in the input box below to unlock delete button
